title: New Level Icon
body: I have completed the first Arcade Mission but i dont get the Summenor Icon. What can I do?

replies.body:
Hello,

you have the possibility to relog, if it does not appear wait atleast 24h. If its does not appear afterwards contact the player support

Greetings Sidia

Riot knows about this issue and is working on it

http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#euw

Greetings
Sidia
